predictions.text: U.S. CPI (All items, 12-month percent change) for November 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.4% in the BLS release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in the BLS CPI news release for November 2025: the 12-month percent change for 'All items' (headline CPI) must be within 2.8% to 3.4%.
monitoring_signals: AAA national average gasoline price trend
Retail discounting intensity during holiday promotions
predictions.rationale: Gasoline down, goods disinflation, and moderating shelter should keep headline CPI near 3%.

predictions.text: The U.S. unemployment rate (U-3, seasonally adjusted) for November 2025 will print between 4.3% and 4.6% in the BLS Employment Situation report.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in the BLS Employment Situation: the seasonally adjusted unemployment rate (U-3) must be within 4.3%–4.6%.
monitoring_signals: Initial and continuing unemployment insurance claims
predictions.rationale: Recent data show a stable but cooling labor market with unemployment near 4.4%.

predictions.text: U.S. Advance Retail and Food Services Sales (headline, MoM, SA) for November 2025 will print between -0.4% and +0.4% in the Census release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify in the Census Bureau’s Advance Monthly Retail and Food Services report: the percent change from the prior month (seasonally adjusted) must be between -0.4% and +0.4%.
monitoring_signals: Adobe Analytics daily holiday e-commerce estimates
Gasoline prices (drag on nominal sales when falling)
predictions.rationale: Holiday promotions support sales, but goods softness and lower gas prices cap nominal growth.

predictions.text: Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or below 13.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Cboe official historical close data, identify any trading day through 2025-12-31 (UTC) where VIX closing value is <= 13.00.
monitoring_signals: Earnings pre-announcements and mega-cap tech moves
predictions.rationale: If macro volatility fades post-events, complacency can compress implied vol into low teens.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.40% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Check FRED series DGS2 daily close; a close at or below 4.40% on any trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC) qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Global rates (JGBs, Bunds) and FX risk sentiment
predictions.rationale: Stable growth and cooling inflation can push the front-end toward lower yields as cuts are priced.

predictions.text: The Brent–WTI front-month settlement spread will close at or below $2.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute the difference between same-day front-month settlements: ICE Brent minus NYMEX WTI. A value <= $2.00/bbl on any day by 2025-12-31 (UTC) meets the criterion.
monitoring_signals: U.S. crude export spreads and freight rates
Geopolitical risk premium in Atlantic Basin
predictions.rationale: Tight U.S. inland balances, export economics, and freight can intermittently compress Brent–WTI.

predictions.text: ERCOT hourly wind generation will reach at least 36,500 MW on at least one hour by 2025-12-31 (CST).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ERCOT public dashboards/historical data to identify any hour through 2025-12-31 (CST) where wind generation >= 36,500 MW.
monitoring_signals: ERCOT daily wind forecast vs actual
Fronts and wind advisories across Texas Panhandle/Gulf
predictions.rationale: Seasonal winter wind patterns and ongoing capacity additions support new peak wind output.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, OFAC will announce at least one North Korea-related sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a press release on home.treasury.gov by 2025-12-31 that announces a sanctions designation explicitly tied to North Korea (DPRK).
monitoring_signals: Illicit finance enforcement actions and advisories
predictions.rationale: Year-end sanction actions and ongoing DPRK activity make an additional designation likely.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-31, CISA will add at least 25 CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog with a Date Added between 2025-12-16 and 2025-12-31 inclusive.
predictions.verification_criteria: Review entries on CISA’s KEV catalog; count CVEs with 'Date Added' between 2025-12-16 and 2025-12-31 inclusive. Total must be >= 25.
monitoring_signals: Active exploitation reports from CERTs and threat intel
Mass-scan exploit telemetry (e.g., Censys, Shodan reports)
Surges in ransomware campaigns exploiting new CVEs
predictions.rationale: CISA often issues year-end KEV additions; heightened threat activity can drive larger batches.

predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will trade at or below $80,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm on a reputable exchange or composite (e.g., CoinDesk price page) that intraday low on any UTC day by 2025-12-31 is <= $80,000.
monitoring_signals: Macro data surprises affecting rates and liquidity
predictions.rationale: Risk-off bouts and liquidity shifts can trigger sharp crypto drawdowns into year-end.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA MOVE Index will close at or below 75.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Check daily close of the MOVE index from a reputable source (e.g., FRED BOAMMOVE). A close <= 75.0 on any day by 2025-12-31 (UTC) qualifies.
predictions.rationale: If policy path stabilizes and liquidity improves, rates vol can compress further.

predictions.text: Federal Reserve ON RRP facility usage will fall to at or below $50.0 billion on at least one business day by 2025-12-31 (New York time).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify on the New York Fed’s published ON RRP operation results that the total take-up is <= $50.0B on any business day by 2025-12-31 (ET).
monitoring_signals: T-bill supply and yields vs ON RRP rate
MMF AUM shifts between bills, repo, and RRP
predictions.rationale: Elevated bill supply and attractive repo rates continue to displace ON RRP usage.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a weekly change in U.S. distillate fuel oil stocks of -4.0 million barrels or more (draw) in at least one report published by 2025-12-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in any EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report through 2025-12-31 that the reported weekly change in distillate fuel oil stocks is <= -4.0 million barrels.
monitoring_signals: Heating degree days (HDDs) and diesel demand
predictions.rationale: Winter demand and refinery maintenance/outages can produce a large weekly distillate draw.
